modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:18343 - Updating platforms for Internet Explorer 11.

criterion.comment: Check if Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 is installed

modified.comment: Added anchor to pattern match in ste:11937

EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:tst:41561 - The attached file replaces existing Chrome objects with new objects containing the set of the existing object, which is correct for individual installs, and the registry key used by the all users installer.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - Adding 18 new definitions for recent chrome CVEs.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15382 - Make registry key checking faster.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15822 - Added windows_view behavior to Google Chrome on 64-bit Windows objects.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15382 - Updated Google Chrome Inventory
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - definitions for the CVEs addressed by version 29.0.1547.57 of Chrome on Windows
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - New Vulnerability Definitions for Chrome addressed by versions 31.0.1650.57 and 31.0.1650.63.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - new vulnerabilities of Google Chrome

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome is installed

metadata.title: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 is installed

reference.ref_id: CIS Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 Benchmark

metadata.description: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 is installed.

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:11792 - Fixed several false positives by setting negate = true. Also fixed several style issues.

EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:tst:43039 - Corrected SQL Server inventory tests to properly match the intended version of SQL and not also all versions after the intended version. Updated comments and platform information.

criterion.comment: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\100\DTS\Setup\\Version is greater than or equal to 10.50.1600.1

criteria.comment: SQL Server instance with version between 10.50.1600.1 and 11.0.0.0

criterion.comment: SQL Server instances with version greater than or equal to 10.50.1600.1 exist
SQL Server instances with version less than 11.0.0.0 exist

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:11792 - SQL Server 32-bit and 64-bit issues.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:26798 - 'MSSQL' added to object regex to narrow search

criterion.comment: SQL Server instances with version greater than 11.0.0.0 exist
SQL Server instances with version less than 12.0.0.0 exist

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:26140 - Fixed/New Inventory Definitions, and fixed Vulnerability Definitions for Microsoft SQL Server 2012 and 2014.

EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:26674 - Modified tests which check SQL Server 2005 Service Packs. The specific version of SQL Server was checked instead of diapason. Now new states were added which mark high limit of SP and operation="greater than or equal" was add to the old states

criterion.comment: Check if SQL Server instances with version greater than 12.0.0.0 exist
